item.title: Publications
item.description: List of publications >> note: my name is highlighted in bold. Journal articles Johannes Nauta, Pieter Simoens, Yara Khaluf and Ricardo Martinez-Garcia. "Foraging behavior and patch size distribution jointly determine population dynamics in fragmented landscapes". Journal of The Royal Society Interface 19.191 (2022). Johannes Nauta, Pieter Simoens, and Yara Khaluf. "Group size and resource fractality drive multimodal search strategies: A quantitative analysis on group foraging". Physica A: Statistical Mechanics and its Applications 590, 126702 (2022).
